rows.label: soul01_P0101
rows.name:
Get into melee!
 I judge it to be best!

rows.label: soul01_P0102
rows.name:
Close the distance!
 Melee attacks at the ready!

rows.label: soul01_P0103
rows.name:
Let rip with melee strikes!
 The bigger, the better!

rows.label: soul01_P0201
rows.name:
The dark feast unfolds...
 Open with a ten-gun salute!

rows.label: soul01_P0202
rows.name:
The mighty need no "buffs"!
 ...But if you're offering...

rows.label: soul01_P0203
rows.name:
Swathe the foe in darkness!
 Yes—it's debuff time!

rows.label: soul01_P0301
rows.name:
Upon my name, I command!
 Let loose your melee attacks!

rows.label: soul01_P0302
rows.name:
Upon my name, I command!
 Let loose your ranged strikes!

rows.label: soul01_P0303
rows.name:
Upon my name, I command!
 Bolster yourself with an aura!

rows.label: soul01_P0401
rows.name:
Huff...
 I am not long for this world...

rows.label: soul01_P0402
rows.name:
This pain is nothing...!
 But buff me all the same!

rows.label: soul01_P0403
rows.name:
The wounds make me strong!
 Quickly, empower me!

rows.label: soul01_P0501
rows.name:
"Daring" is my middle name.
 ...Please, heal me!

rows.label: soul01_P0502
rows.name:
Is my tale to end here...?!
 Someone, bring healing!

rows.label: soul01_P0503
rows.name:
I welcome the challenge!
 But I could use support!

rows.label: soul01_P0601
rows.name:
Argh! As I lay dying...
 Show me a melee strike...

rows.label: soul01_P0602
rows.name:
Oorgh! The abyss calls me...
 Don't stand there, shoot it!

rows.label: soul01_P0603
rows.name:
My time approaches...
 Send me off with an aura!

rows.label: soul01_P0701
rows.name:
Gyahaha!
 See them off with a salvo!

rows.label: soul01_P0702
rows.name:
Feel the sting! The sting of
 our ranged attacks, that is!

rows.label: soul01_P0703
rows.name:
A critical hit upon you!
 Now just to weaken them!

rows.label: soul01_P0801
rows.name:
I have broken their defenses!
 Go, follow up in the melee!

rows.label: soul01_P0802
rows.name:
Hah... Utter FOOLISHNESS!
 Mow 'em down at range!

rows.label: soul01_P0803
rows.name:
My genius frightens even me;
 enfeeble the broken wretch!

rows.label: soul01_P0901
rows.name:
The feast continues apace!
 Shoot the giant, fire at will!

rows.label: soul01_P0902
rows.name:
Empower yourself with Arts!
 Show them we're invincible!

rows.label: soul01_P0903
rows.name:
I shall grant you a swift end!
 Yes! Initiate OVERCLOCK!

rows.label: soul01_P1001
rows.name:
Are you struggling...?
 Let close combat be a balm!

rows.label: soul01_P1002
rows.name:
Having a bad day...?
 Bring 'em death by bullets!

rows.label: soul01_P1003
rows.name:
Feeling afear'd...?
 Weaken the foe, lest they win!

rows.label: soul01_P1101
rows.name:
I...am...SHINING!
 Indeed! Grant us an aura!

rows.label: soul01_P1102
rows.name:
Only one thing could make us
 brighter, and that's an aura!

rows.label: soul01_P1103
rows.name:
Heighten your senses...!
 Yea, with an aura!

rows.label: soul01_P1201
rows.name:
Activate Overclock, and soar
 to heights hitherto unknown!

rows.label: soul01_P1202
rows.name:
Let our bodies move as one!
 OVERDRRRIVE!!!

rows.label: soul01_P1203
rows.name:
I am the man with all the
 gifts! Grant me an aura!

rows.label: soul01_C0101
rows.name:
Beat it, weaklings! And beat
 those too, with melee strikes!

rows.label: soul01_C0102
rows.name:
What's wrong? Shoot 'em!
 Or don't you want to live?!

rows.label: soul01_C0103
rows.name:
The fight is just beginning!
 Strengthen me!

rows.label: soul01_C0201
rows.name:
Their attacks will never land!
 So use an aura and aid me!

rows.label: soul01_C0202
rows.name:
Use empowering abilities!
 It is destiny at work!

rows.label: soul01_C0203
rows.name:
I call this my thunder bullet!
 It is my gift to YOU!

rows.label: soul01_C0301
rows.name:
The gods envy my strength!
 Follow me into the melee!

rows.label: soul01_C0302
rows.name:
I shoot like a demon! Now,
 it's your turn—fire at will!

rows.label: soul01_C0303
rows.name:
Noble spirits, guide my hand!
 Now you—try to one-up me!

rows.label: soul01_C0401
rows.name:
Howl into the ragged sky!
 Strength be with us!!!

rows.label: soul01_C0402
rows.name:
The stars weep for us!
 Cheer them—with an aura!

rows.label: soul01_C0403
rows.name:
I divine the will of Mira!
 She says—use a debuff!

rows.label: soul01_C0501
rows.name:
By the sinful, coursing stars!
 Strengthen yourself, fast!

rows.label: soul01_C0502
rows.name:
Aren't I dashing? Show your
 admiration by buffing me!

rows.label: soul01_C0503
rows.name:
The wind that brings death...
 Take wing, with Overclock!

rows.label: soul01_C0601
rows.name:
Have no concern for me!
 Hit them up close, instead!

rows.label: soul01_C0602
rows.name:
This is nothing to me!
 Let fly with projectiles!

rows.label: soul01_C0603
rows.name:
I am in agony, on the brink...
 But you are more important!

rows.label: soul01_C0701
rows.name:
This warmth—a sprite?!
 Embrace it with a boost!

rows.label: soul01_C0702
rows.name:
You are as unto an angel.
 Now lift me higher—buff me!

rows.label: soul01_C0703
rows.name:
Let up!
 Your survival is paramount!

rows.label: soul01_C0801
rows.name:
Burn bright before you burn
 out! ...Well, I'm waiting!

rows.label: soul01_C0802
rows.name:
Your marksmanship is truly
 a thing of beauty! My word!

rows.label: soul01_C0803
rows.name:
This place is under my
 protection! Go on ahead!

rows.label: soul01_C0901
rows.name:
Villain! Accept your just
 deserts! All guns, fire!

rows.label: soul01_C0902
rows.name:
Raising your hand to me was
 a grave sin. Back me up!

rows.label: soul01_C0903
rows.name:
Not too shabby!
 Now, follow my lead!

rows.label: soul01_C1001
rows.name:
I am a nightmare, fallen from
 heaven's grace! Kneel, now!

rows.label: soul01_C1002
rows.name:
Grovel if you will, there will be
 no mercy! That is my creed!

rows.label: soul01_C1003
rows.name:
Prostrate yourself before me!
 Then, use a weakening skill!

rows.label: soul01_C1101
rows.name:
Gahaha... Move, if you dare!
 And then die!!!

rows.label: soul01_C1102
rows.name:
I'll carve my name into your
 stopped body! Shoot through!

rows.label: soul01_C1103
rows.name:
Weaken 'em at once! I am
 more ruthless than death.

rows.label: soul01_C1201
rows.name:
Sleep, till the reaper takes
 you! ...Psst, that's your cue!

rows.label: soul01_C1202
rows.name:
No oblivion for you yet. Let
 your gunfire be their wakeup!

rows.label: soul01_C1203
rows.name:
A blow as searing as hell...
 Show them your melee skills!

rows.label: soul01_C1301
rows.name:
Melee attacks, now! Surely
 you're more than able?

rows.label: soul01_C1302
rows.name:
There is no escape!
 Now, rain fire upon them!

rows.label: soul01_C1303
rows.name:
Slumber in my embrace!
 Behold, ETERNAL BINDING!

rows.label: soul01_C1401
rows.name:
Fuselage repairs? Bah!
 I have no need of it!

rows.label: soul01_C1402
rows.name:
'Tis nary a scratch!
 Come, lay into 'em in melee!

rows.label: soul01_C1403
rows.name:
This damage is trifling... 
 But still, I shan't forgive you!

rows.label: soul01_C1501
rows.name:
Guh! T'was merely a shell.
 Quickly, bring healing!

rows.label: soul01_C1502
rows.name:
The gods are mischievous.
 Buff yourself, then overcome!

rows.label: soul01_C1503
rows.name:
You want to see my worst?
 Then watch! OVERCLOCK!

rows.label: soul01_C1601
rows.name:
My steed is flagging... Quick!
 Strengthen us!

rows.label: soul01_C1602
rows.name:
I require healing!
 My steed is being insistent.

rows.label: soul01_C1603
rows.name:
Low fuel...
 Fine! We die together!
